latest.title: Robotics Club Wins National Championship 2024
latest.author: Aman Kumar
latest.excerpt: Our team secured first place in the National Robotics Championship 2024, showcasing innovative autonomous navigation systems.
latest.content: The Robotics Club achieved a historic victory at the National Robotics Championship 2024, held in Delhi. Our team, led by Aman Kumar, developed an advanced autonomous navigation system that outperformed 50+ competing teams from across the country. The winning robot demonstrated exceptional obstacle avoidance, path planning, and real-time decision-making capabilities.

latest.title: New AI Workshop Series Announced
latest.author: Sachin Sir
latest.excerpt: Join our comprehensive AI workshop series starting next month. Learn machine learning, computer vision, and robotics integration.
latest.content: We're excited to announce our new AI Workshop Series that will cover machine learning fundamentals, computer vision applications, and robotics integration. The series will be conducted by industry experts and our faculty members. Students will get hands-on experience with real-world projects and cutting-edge AI technologies.

latest.title: Humanoid Robot Project Milestone Reached
latest.author: Monu Kumar
latest.excerpt: Our humanoid robot project has successfully completed its first phase with basic locomotion and object recognition capabilities.
latest.content: The humanoid robot project, led by Monu Kumar, has reached a significant milestone. The robot now demonstrates stable bipedal locomotion, basic object recognition, and simple task execution. This achievement represents months of dedicated work by our team and opens new possibilities for advanced robotics research.

latest.title: Industry Partnership with TechCorp Robotics
latest.author: Manish Kumar
latest.excerpt: Exciting new partnership announced with TechCorp Robotics for collaborative research and internship opportunities.
latest.content: We're thrilled to announce our new partnership with TechCorp Robotics, a leading robotics company. This collaboration will provide our students with internship opportunities, access to advanced robotics equipment, and collaborative research projects. The partnership will also include guest lectures from industry experts.

latest.title: Drone Technology Workshop Success
latest.author: Sourabh Kumar
latest.excerpt: Over 50 students participated in our drone technology workshop, learning about autonomous flight and aerial robotics.
latest.content: Our recent drone technology workshop was a huge success with over 50 students participating. The workshop covered autonomous flight systems, drone programming, and aerial robotics applications. Students built and programmed their own drones, gaining hands-on experience with cutting-edge technology.

latest.title: Research Paper Published in IEEE Robotics Journal
latest.author: Priya Patel
latest.excerpt: Our research on swarm robotics for disaster management has been published in the prestigious IEEE Robotics Journal.
latest.content: Congratulations to Priya Patel and her team for having their research paper on 'Swarm Robotics for Disaster Management' published in the IEEE Robotics Journal. This publication represents a significant contribution to the field of robotics and showcases our club's research capabilities.
